meanings.sent1: The tree had a slender trunk.
meanings.sent2: She had a slender figure that made her a great dancer.
meanings.sent3: The slender cat squeezed through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: Her slender fingers delicately played the piano keys.
meanings.sent5: The slender thread held the beads together with ease.

meanings.sent1: The ballerina had a slender body that moved with elegance.
meanings.sent2: He admired her slender neck as she turned to smile at him.
meanings.sent3: The slender swan glided across the pond with poise.
meanings.sent4: Her slender arms reached out gracefully to catch the falling leaf.
meanings.sent5: The slender branches of the willow tree swayed in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Small or limited in amount or extent
meanings.sent1: She had a slender chance of winning the competition.
meanings.sent2: The slender budget forced them to make tough decisions.
meanings.sent3: His slender knowledge of the subject made him hesitant to speak up.
meanings.sent4: The slender hope of finding the lost ring faded with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The slender beam of light illuminated the dark room briefly.
